#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

inline void readint(int &x)
{
	register int c = getchar_unlocked();
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = getchar_unlocked()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

inline void writeint(long long int x, char endchar)
{
	if(x == 0)
		putchar_unlocked('0');
	else
	{
		int cnt = 0;
		char ch[20];
		while(x != 0)
		{
			ch[cnt++] = x%10 + '0';
			x /= 10;
		}
		for(int i=cnt - 1; i>=0; --i)
			putchar_unlocked(ch[i]);
	}
	putchar_unlocked(endchar);
}

inline void writestring(const char* ch)
{
	while(*ch != '\0')
		putchar_unlocked(*(ch++));
	putchar_unlocked('\n');
}

#define mod 1000000007

long long int a[33][3][3] = {0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 2, 4, 1, 0, 0, 1, 2, 4, 1, 2, 6, 5, 2, 6, 5, 10, 22, 11, 22, 54, 33, 174, 414, 241, 482, 1138, 655, 1310, 3102, 1793, 545534, 1290750, 745217, 1490434, 186908001, 373816002, 348017555, 974201561, 632184521, 515375382, 883190869, 766381731, 164947969, 398566244, 797132488, 360646693, 563514213, 258236065, 625611143, 367375079, 734750158, 727736374, 992986222, 985972437, 706695018, 720722589, 147164213, 460741867, 313577655, 627155310, 401474826, 774319522, 548639037, 724433377, 175794341, 301606703, 341707111, 40100409, 80200818, 462008339, 287768236, 575536472, 60502239, 484965775, 466948586, 632950546, 166001961, 332003922, 130956423, 798952507, 597905007, 527813929, 929908930, 633104420, 897362568, 264258149, 528516298, 690137009, 161620710, 323241420, 174999131, 851757719, 632423397, 610392343, 977968954, 955937901, 544299185, 588361290, 176722573, 309383040, 132660468, 997910331, 756323608, 758413285, 516826563, 31563443, 514736886, 29473765, 575774093, 546300329, 626431782, 876051880, 249620099, 499240198, 624912171, 125671972, 251343944, 1928079, 750584143, 465875125, 146076947, 680201830, 360403653, 186682424, 826278777, 652557547, 665518740, 12961194, 66464116, 510942378, 444478263, 888956526, 844377161, 955420641, 910841275, 710639062, 799797795, 785120342, 479888886, 694768552, 389537097, 564194529, 174657431, 349314862, 88166814, 738851960}; 
long long int curr[3][3];
long long int temp[3][3];

long long int compute(int n)
{
	for(int i=0; i<3; ++i)
		for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
		{
			if(i == j)
				curr[i][j] = 1;
			else
				curr[i][j] = 0;
		}
	int ind = 0;
	while(n > 0)
	{
		if(n % 2 == 1)
		{
			for(int i=0; i<3; ++i)
				for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
					temp[i][j] = curr[i][j];
			for(int i=0; i<3; ++i)
				for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
				{
					curr[i][j] = 0;
					for(int k=0; k<3; ++k)
						curr[i][j] = (curr[i][j] + (temp[i][k] * a[ind][k][j]) % mod) % mod;
				}
		}
		n /= 2;
		ind++;
	}
	return (curr[0][0] + curr[0][1] + curr[0][2] * 5) % mod;
}



int main()
{
	/*for(int i=0; i<33; ++i)
	{
		for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
		{
			for(int k=0; k<3; ++k)
			{
				sq[j][k] = 0;
				for(int l=0; l<3; ++l)
				{
					sq[j][k] = (sq[j][k] + (a[j][l] * a[l][k]) % mod) % mod;
				}
				cout<<sq[j][k]<<", ";
			}
		}
		for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
			for(int k=0; k < 3; ++k)
				a[j][k] = sq[j][k];
		//cout<<endl;
	}*/
	int t;
	readint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		readint(n);
		writeint(compute(n), '\n');
	}
	return 0;
}
